KnowledgeBase.Title: fieldsOf
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords:
define set make object structure inherit
parent object-oriented classes

Function.Description: The fieldsOf function returns the field bindings associated with the specified structure type.

Brief.Overview: The fieldsOf function returns the field bindings (symbolic key-value pair) associated with the specified structure type (see defineStructure). The field bindings for a given type are set by the defineStructure or the defstruct Function.
Brief.Usage: The fieldsOf function is used to retrieve the field names and values for a user defined structure type (defined by defineStructure or defstruct) .

Syntax-Structure.Return: A structure containing the bindings (fields names and value pairs) for the type
